name: ESTATE OF Kenneth I. SEIDEL, Deceased, Late of Maxatawny Township, Berks County. Appeal of Joyce OSWALD, Exceptant

judges: Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT and HUTCHINSON, JJ.
parties: ESTATE OF Kenneth I. SEIDEL, Deceased, Late of Maxatawny Township, Berks County. Appeal of Joyce OSWALD, Exceptant

opinions.text:
DECREE
PER CURIAM.
Decree affirmed. Each party pay own costs.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Robert P. Grim, David A. Binder, Reading, for appellant.
Craig S. Boyd, Boyertown, for Est. of Seidel.
Lee D. Mescolotto for Esther M. Seidel.
casebody.head_matter:
445 A.2d 102
ESTATE OF Kenneth I. SEIDEL, Deceased, Late of Maxatawny Township, Berks County. Appeal of Joyce OSWALD, Exceptant
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued April 22, 1982.
Decided May 19, 1982.
Robert P. Grim, David A. Binder, Reading, for appellant.
Craig S. Boyd, Boyertown, for Est. of Seidel.
Lee D. Mescolotto for Esther M. Seidel.
Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT and HUTCHINSON, JJ.
